titleStmt.title: The rustick rampant or rurall anarchy affronting monarchy : in the insurrection of VVat Tiler. / By J.C.
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F.C. and are to be sold at Westminster-Hall and the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Engraved portrait on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
